Package ut.twente.notebridge.dao

Enum Class PostDao

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<PostDao>
ut.twente.notebridge.dao.PostDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<PostDao>, Constable
public enum PostDao extends Enum<PostDao>
This class is used to interact with the database for the Post model.

      Gets all posts from the database. Supports the use of pagination, searching, filtering and sorting
      Returns:
      A list of all posts

    • getSponsoredPosts

      public List<PostDto> getSponsoredPosts()
      Returns a list of all sponsored posts that are valid within the sponsoredUntil date in the database.
      Returns:
      The list of all valid sponsored posts

    • getPost

      public Post getPost(int id)
      Returns a post from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the requested post
      Returns:
      The requested post

    • toggleLike

      public Like toggleLike(Like like)
      If the user has liked the post, the like is removed. If the user has not liked the post, the like is added.
      Parameters:
      like - The like to be added or removed
      Returns:
      The like that was added or removed

    • toggleInterest

      public Interest toggleInterest(Interest interest)
      If the user has shown interest in the post, the interest is removed. If the user has not shown interest in the post, the interest is added.
      Parameters:
      interest - The interest to be added or removed
      Returns:
      The interest that was added or removed

    • create

      public Post create(Post newPost)
      Creates a post in the database.
      Parameters:
      newPost - The post to be created
      Returns:
      The created post

      Parameters:
      personId - The id of the person
      Returns:
      The list of all posts from the person

    • getTotalPosts

      public int getTotalPosts(String sql)
      Extracts the total number of posts from the database.
      Parameters:
      sql - The sql query to be executed, which is obtained dynamically from the getPosts method in getPosts route.
      Returns:
      The total number of posts

    • createImages

      public void createImages(Post post, List<org.glassfish.jersey.media.multipart.FormDataBodyPart> parts)
      Creates images for a post in the database.
      Parameters:
      post - The post to which the images belong
      parts - The images to be created

    • getImages

      public List<String> getImages(Integer id)
      Gets images for a post from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the post
      Returns:
      The list of image URL's

    • getFirstImage

      public String getFirstImage(Integer id)
      Gets the first image for a post from the database. It is used to display only first images of the posts if there is any in the overview page
      Parameters:
      id - The id of the post
      Returns:
      The first image as a base64 encoded string
